items.title: 'Revenge saving' picks up as consumers brace for economic uncertainty
items.excerpt: Americans are tightening their belts, as concerns about tariffs, inflation, job security and market volatility have prompted many consumers to pare back their spending and increase their savings, financial experts say.

items.title: Most Americans say this financial milestone makes you an adult
items.excerpt: These days, it's common for parents to give their adult children some financial support . But it wouldn't take a lot to be considered independent .

items.title: Average 401(k) savings rates are at record-high levels. How figures compare to popular benchmarks
items.excerpt: The average 401(k) savings rate has maintained a record high, as some retirement plans make it easier for workers to enroll and contribute.

items.title: Hereâ€™s the salary Americans say they now need to earn to live comfortably
items.excerpt: With higher prices now firmly entrenched, and President Donald Trump's tariffs fueling inflationary concerns, most Americans say they need an income boost to get by, according to a new report.
